high_descs: Turn around and face the desk behind.
Pick up the bowl from the desk.
Cross the room and stand in front of the cabinet with the lamp with a green shade.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a bowl in hand.

high_descs: Turn left and face the table.
Pick up the bowl from the table.
Turn right and go to the bedside table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the bowl and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Move to the desk in front of the window
Pick up a bowl from the desk
Move to the dresser at the foot of the bed
anns.task_desc: Inspect a bowl with a lamp.
